revision.text:
[[File:FireStone.png|thumb|200px|The Fire Stone]]
==Details==
===Description=== The Fire Stone costs 2,500 [[Quest Points]]. It can be bought from the [[shops]] of [[Shops#Kanto:_Locations_and_items|Cinnabar Island]] in [[Kanto]]. It can also be mined from the [[Underground]].
===Uses=== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Pre-Evolution !! Evolution |- | Vulpix || | Ninetales |- | Growlithe || | Arcanine |- | Eevee || | Flareon |}
[[Category:Items]] [[Category:Evolution Items]]
